oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Various statements are given with regard to the nature and movements of the celestial bodies. The first of these treats of the Moon and Stars, ending with the 'Bushman rice' Star Canopus (B I. 291
294). A female Star who is red marries a male Star who is also red, and they have a Star child. This is because they are the Stars.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A story about another Star
